mapper.update: MERGE INTO BOARD_STAR T USING ( SELECT #{boardNo} AS BOARD_NO, #{memNo} AS MEM_NO, #{star} AS STAR FROM DUAL ) S ON (T.BOARD_NO = S.BOARD_NO AND T.MEM_NO = S.MEM_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.STAR = S.STAR, T.UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (STAR_NO, BOARD_NO, MEM_NO, STAR, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_STAR.NEXTVAL, S.BOARD_NO, S.MEM_NO, S.STAR, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
